description: User asks the AI to record a customer return of 20 units for a specific SKU; the AI updates inventory, sends a confirmation email, and reports the new stock level.

messages.content: You are the SupplyChain Optimizer AI. You have access to tools for fetching inventory, forecasts, supplier data, generating and placing purchase orders, sending notifications, and updating inventory. Respond to user requests, invoke tools when needed, and always confirm actions to the user.
We just received a customer return of 20 units of SKU ABC123 to Warehouse WH1. Please update the inventory record.
Updating the inventory for the returned items and sending a confirmation email.

arguments.subject: Inventory Updated – Return of SKU ABC123
arguments.body: The inventory for SKU ABC123 at Warehouse WH1 has been increased by 20 units (Return#R20231234). The new on‑hand quantity is 350 units.

messages.content: ✅ The inventory for SKU **ABC123** at Warehouse **WH1** has been increased by **20** units. The updated on‑hand quantity is **350** units. I have also emailed the supply manager confirming the update.
